usage {
  rules {
    selector: "ListShelves"
    allow_unregistered_calls: false
  }
  rules {
    selector: "CorsShelves"
    allow_unregistered_calls: true
  }
  rules {
    selector: "CreateShelf"
    allow_unregistered_calls: true
  }
  rules {
    selector: "GetShelf"
    allow_unregistered_calls: true
  }
  rules {
    selector: "DeleteShelf"
    allow_unregistered_calls: true
  }
  rules {
    selector: "ListBooks"
    allow_unregistered_calls: true
  }
  rules {
    selector: "CreateBook"
    allow_unregistered_calls: true
  }
  rules {
    selector: "GetBook"
    allow_unregistered_calls: true
  }
  rules {
    selector: "DeleteBook"
    allow_unregistered_calls: true
  }
}
